articles.title: Weighing Earth's Forests Using a Space Umbrella - AZoCleantech
articles.description: The European Space Agency's BIOMASS mission is scheduled to launch in 2023 to provide a space-based survey of Earth's forests, allowing scientists to monitor forest biomass and quantify the impacts of deforestation on climate change.

articles.title: Gillian Chung was detained at airport in Germany because she's too pretty - The Star Online
articles.description: Apparently, the authority thought the singer-actress was entering Europe to do “illegal things”.
articles.content:
It seems being too pretty is a crime after all.
